name: RemoveSIMCardGroupPrivateWirelessGateway
description: This action will asynchronously remove an existing Private Wireless Gateway definition from a SIM card group. Completing this operation defines that all SIM cards in the SIM card group will get their traffic handled by Telnyx's default mobile network configuration.

$ul: **data**: This object represents a SIM card group action request. It allows tracking the current status of an operation that impacts the SIM card group and SIM card in it.
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was created.
**settings**: A JSON object representation of the action params.
**private_wireless_gateway_id**: The identification of the related Private Wireless Gateway resource.
**type**: Represents the type of the operation requested.
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was updated.
